MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG4 postcode area of Sanquhar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:33am. Our engineers are on their way to Kelloholm, Craig Drive substation to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:28am on 14th January?
